member.name: M:IMGRipper.MemoryHelper.Align(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the result of aligning a value to a specified alignment.
member.returns: The byte-aligned value; If the alignment is zero, the unmodified value.

member.name: M:IMGRipper.MemoryHelper.Align(System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns the result of aligning a value to a specified alignment.
member.returns: The byte-aligned value; If the alignment is zero, the unmodified value.
